# Lotterhos Lab Protocols {.unnumbered}

This site is dedicated to the protocols used in the Lotterhos Lab at the Northeastern University Marine Science Center.

If you are new to the lab you may want to jump over to the [welcome page](https://drk-lo.github.io/lotterhoslabprotocols/welcome/). This page will help you navigate the lab, protocols and the MSC.
